title: F.Developers
author: F.Developers
content: Hello. I have the link to some APIs that can generate unlimited virtual cards either Mastercard or Visa.So this offer contains the following:1) I will build a complete service for you, a good back end for admin and a user area for customers to load and buy your card with crypto or any payment of your choice.2) API: Your customers too would be able to buy your cards via your own API which I will build.3) Domain & hosting & security.4) Marketing Guide and a general business plan towards how you can break even within few weeks!The cost ranges between $1,500 to $3,500 depending on the final features agreed.I can accept payment via milestones to increase trust,I can also create some tests cards for you to use (paid for by you)All other info would be via PM.Regards.
